subSubSection.paragraph: Supplementary description. Metope elongate, lateral margins weakly convex, apical angles horn-shaped. Metope with median and sublateral keels reaching its apical margin, but not joined apically and not reaching clypeus. Median keel of metope reaching only middle of metope. Clypeus wide and long. Coryphe transverse, anterior margin strongly convex and truncate, posterior margin obtusely angulate. Pronotum pressed-in, with anterior margin strongly convex, posterior margin straight. Scutellum longer than pronotum, without keels. Fore wings narrow apically, with transparent precostal area. Corium is not transparent. Radius and median bifurcate, cubitus anterior simple, veins with several callosities. Clavus long ( 3 / 4 as long as corium). Hind wings well developed, with deep incision between remigium and vannus. Radius, median, cubitus anterior, cubitus posterior, and first anal vein simple, postcubitus bifurcate, veins with numerous branches apically, anal lobe narrow. Hind tibia with 2 lateral teeth. Metatarsomere I with 6 intermediate socle setae.
